MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the KA24 area of Dalry, affecting properties in Aitnock Place and surrounding areas. It has been necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 7:26pm due to critical incident at 6 Aitnock Place and this may affect the supply to your property. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of the extent of the repairs required and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 9:30pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 8:34pm on Tuesday, 27 October 2020
